overview: The complete, true story of Patsy Cline's brilliant rise to stardom and her tragic death at the pinnacle of her career. This unique video biography features rare and classic performances; Patsy's hit songs, such as Crazy, I Fall To Pieces and more.
tagline: She had the voice of an angel, a career fraught with triumph and disaster and a private life that exceeds any scriptwriter's imagination.
title: The Real Patsy Cline
